2. white screen appears, exit game then reenter

4. Go back out to the folder, check if file has been deleted, if not do so (there may be another folder named deleted saves, I just deleted that one too)
5. Copy paste the downloaded save in to the folder
6. Voila!

From what I can tell, in the original uncracked game, any time you request a mission or complete a mission, your game will make a request from Ubisoft for "permission" to continue the storyline. Ubisoft then grants you a "token" (via an update to your values.db file).

What this means is that for a fully unlocked game, we need the values.db file from a legit 100% completion of ACreed2. Someone from the forementioned link has been generous enough to play the game legitimately and upload his values.db to the community.
